chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: input -> option nat
prec: input -> bool
prec_valid: forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v
cls: seq nid
cs: seq nid
Huniq: is_true (uniq nodes)
to: nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
m: seq nat

Goal:
cs_safe this to d m -> coh d

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
input = seq nat : Set
Notation nodes := (cs ++ cls)
Notation seq := list
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType]
Notation coh := CalCoh
cs_safe = fun (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => [/\ to \in cs, this \in cls, coh d & prec msg] : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments cs_safe _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
findPt_inv : find ?k1 (pts ?k2 ?v) = Some ?w -> [/\ ?k1 = ?k2, ?v = ?w & cond ?U ?k2] where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- ?V]
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType] ?x : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [f : input -> option nat prec : input ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Equality.sort ?T]
or3P : reflect [\/ ?b1, ?b2 | ?b3] [|| ?b1, ?b2 | ?b3] where ?b1 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- bool] ?b2 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- bool]
hasP : reflect (exists2 x : ?T, x \in ?s & ?a x) (has ?a ?s) where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType] ?a : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- seq ?T]
